I join the Cuban-American exile community in commemorating the forty one lives lost at the hands of the Cuban regime during the '13th of March' Tugboat Massacre. 

The victims will NEVER be forgotten.

RT @LaDemos Do:
✅ Stock up on non perishable foods and water
✅ Listen to officials for updates
✅ Call 211 for shelter information
✅ Call 911 for life threatening emergencies and 311 for parish inquiries

Don’t:
❌ Drive through high water
❌ Sightsee on the levees

#lalege #lagov #lawx

RT @LaDemos Stay safe during #Barry:

http://Getagameplan.org - Make sure you have a plan in place
http://Emergency.la.gov - Real time updates on the storm
http://511la.org - Check for road closures throughout the state to plan your route

RT @AlexSJacquez Medicare for All means freedom and security. I’ll explain: https://twitter.com/berniesanders/status/1150075816950280193 QT @BernieSanders Trump is lying again about Medicare for All. Here is what it really means for Americans:

-No premiums
-No co-pays
-No deductibles
-No losing coverage
-No "out of network" doctors

We must oppose Mr. Trump's nightmarish mass-deportation plans. We must stop family separation, reunite families that have been separated, and eliminate private detention facilities. Know your rights. We have started to sound the alarm on the way facial recognition technology is expanding in concerning says.

From the FBI to ICE to Amazon, the bar for consent and civil liberties protection is repeatedly violated, and on top of it all has a disproportionate racial impact, too. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/1150063988593582081 QT @nytimes Millions of people’s images, taken from security cameras and sites like OkCupid, are quietly being used to train facial recognition software https://trib.al/ehRrUFz

Amazing day with @realDonaldTrump! Together we will shrink government, end wars and spend money at home not abroad! #maga http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D_YErusXsAApoWV.jpg

We have a health care crisis. Every day, Americans die because they can't afford health care, while insurance and drug company CEOs get rich off their suffering. 

We cannot continue to tinker around the edges while 80 million Americans lack health insurance or are under-insured.

It's preposterous to argue that, as we expand Medicare for All, people with cancer and other illnesses would not get the care that they need.

Over four years we will transition to a system in which Medicare is expanded to cover everyone with no copays, deductibles or premiums.

At a time when Donald Trump and the health insurance industry are lying every day about Medicare for All, I would hope that my fellow Democrats would not resort to misinformation about my legislation. https://twitter.com/ericbradner/status/1149770643916951552 QT @ericbradner Biden talks Medicare-for-all, saying proponents “mean well.” 

But: “I don’t want to start over. How many of you out there have had someone you’ve lost to cancer? Or cancer yourself? No time, man. We cannot have a hiatus of six months, a year, two, three, to get something done."

RT @ACLUNJ Know your rights. Use them, assert them.

For years, people in power have said our ideas are too radical.

We must remember that Americans today support Medicare for All, a Green New Deal & ending our racist immigration & criminal justice systems.

No matter who stands in the way we must continue our fight for justice.

Here’s one clip from a recent hearing on how facia recognition can make racial injustices worse (this tech does not work well on people of color, and confuses innocent people with those who have criminal records): https://twitter.com/nowthisnews/status/1131966336710537216?s=21 QT @nowthisnews .@AOC called out tech companies for using facial recognition, designed mostly by and for white men, and selling the data without Americans' consent http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1131560427282944000/img/Y4w2g_Jw1BQ5y3O8.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1131560427282944000/vid/320x320/QbrjdUsPXaPc_0Xp.mp4?tag=12

Californians: be prepared and know your rights. Reports indicate that raids will take place across California this weekend. Know that I see you, I’m with you, and I will continue to fight for you and your family. Stay safe. https://oag.ca.gov/immigrant/rights

Right now, countless immigrant families are living in fear of immigration raids. Mothers and fathers are wondering if they are spending their last moments with their children before being separated. Children are too afraid to play outside.
 
This is not the America I know.

I am connecting w/ @SF_Interfaith to share resources & receive feedback from leaders in faith communities protecting immigrant families from Trump’s cruel policies. I thank all of these frontline orgs for their leadership & commitment. #KnowYourRights #FamiliesBelongTogether http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D_YiH7XWkAAtl5w.jpg

Money laundering, currency manipulation, bribery, conspiracy, rate tampering, collusion: These are the routine practices of Wall Street—and a number of financial executives themselves have acknowledged it.

We have the guts to take Wall Street on and we will end their greed.

#SaturdayThoughts

@JungleGoldScott (Also, I hope people lay off trolling you - I’m asking honestly. For a diverse community like mine, it’s hard for my constituents to understand why advocating for them & issues that impact their lives is considered “divisive” or “baiting” to some people. Trying to understand.)

One of the big reasons I don’t believe we should make decisions based on “what GOP will say” is bc they are going to say it anyway. This is a perfect example.

So let’s get on w an unapologetic agenda that fights as hard for working people as possible. They can catch up later. https://twitter.com/chrislhayes/status/1149909324757684229 QT @chrislhayes So even thought the House Democrats went along w the McConnell funding bill in the Senate, Pence is still running around blaming “Democrats in Congress” for not adequately funding their detention camps.

Gun violence is the leading cause of death for young Black men in America. We must stop this. When president, I will take executive action to ensure guns do not fall into the wrong hands. 

It’s not enough to just talk — Americans deserve action.
